Merge pull request #11 from smgt/add-active-marker-on-experiments

Add the state of the experiment to experiments list
Changed the registration of functions from global scope to local scope due namespace pollution;
Color a little dot instead of the full cell

Add the state of the experiment to experiments list

It is hard to tell which tests are running and which are not, so I
suggest adding a color to the left on the experiments list. Red is for
stopped and green is for running. Colors used are from the [Firefox OS
guide](http://buildingfirefoxos.com/common-controls/fonts-and-colors/)

Merge pull request #9 from typpo/expires

Add "expires" option for setting cookie lifetime

Support an "expires" option for setting # of days it will take for
Abba cookies to expire.

Fix a bug where extend does not return an Object.

'extend', when compiled to js, was returning an array of
arrays rather than an object due to implicit return.

This broke the options sent to setCookie, because the 'expires'
attribute of the returned options object was always undefined,
so the cookie expiration field was never set as
options.expires.toGMTString().

As a result, the abbaVariant and abbaPersistComplete cookies
incorrectly had no expiration date or a received a default expiration
from the browser, rather than the 600 day expiration specified
in the code.
